Class Player

java.lang.Object
org.myshelfie.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
Class that represents a player in the game.

    • getTilePicked

      public LocatedTile getTilePicked(int index) throws WrongArgumentException
      Getter for a single tile in the hand of this player. This method is used in SelectTileFromHandCommand.execute().
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the tile inside the hand
      Returns:
      The located tile in the position index inside the player's hand
      Throws:
      WrongArgumentException - If the index is out of bound

    • addTilesPicked

      public void addTilesPicked(LocatedTile t) throws WrongArgumentException
      Add a tile to the hand of this player.
      Parameters:
      t - The located tile to add
      Throws:
      WrongArgumentException - If the hand is full

    • getPublicPoints

      public int getPublicPoints()
      Getter for the public points, i.e. the points earned from the common goal tokens or from groups of adjacent tiles of the same type in the bookshelf.
      Returns:
      number of public points

    • getBookshelfPoints

      public int getBookshelfPoints()
      Getter for the points earned from groups of adjacent tiles of the same type.
      Returns:
      number of private points

    • removeTilesPicked

      public void removeTilesPicked(LocatedTile t) throws WrongArgumentException
      Remove the tile t from the hand of this player.
      Parameters:
      t - The tile to remove
      Throws:
      WrongArgumentException - If the tile is not in the hand

      Parameters:

      Throws:
